column4: How long can you keep a PowerBook running Ubuntu on before it gets too hot?
your PB should never get hot
So I can keep it on, theoretically, forever?
This PowerBook line runs notoriously hot.  (The joke is that you could cook an egg on its belly.)
What's been your slowest with Linux?
LOL, that was you slowest?  I'm on 233MHz
I lucked out finding this PowerBook there; I'd been looking for one for a while
start typing a nick, and tab-complete it
Still, i can access the CD while the powerbook is networked to the other computer with the CD drive.
LOL, I'll proceed with that good voodoo
